resources:
MPAndroidChart Example Settings Hello world! — End —
Line Chart A simple demonstration of the linechart. Line Chart (Dual YAxis) Demonstration of the linechart with dual y-axis. Bar Chart A simple demonstration of the bar chart. Horizontal Bar Chart A simple demonstration of the horizontal bar chart. Combined Chart Demonstrates how to create a combined chart (bar and line in this case). Pie Chart A simple demonstration of the pie chart. Pie Chart with value lines A simple demonstration of the pie chart with polyline notes. Scatter Chart A simple demonstration of the scatter chart. Bubble Chart A simple demonstration of the bubble chart. Stacked Bar Chart A simple demonstration of a bar chart with stacked bars. Stacked Bar Chart Negative A simple demonstration of stacked bars with negative and positive values. Another Bar Chart Implementation of a BarChart that only shows values at the bottom. Multiple Lines Chart A line chart with multiple DataSet objects. One color per DataSet. Multiple Bars Chart A bar chart with multiple DataSet objects. One multiple colors per DataSet. Charts in ViewPager Fragments Demonstration of charts inside ViewPager Fragments. In this example the focus was on the design and look and feel of the chart. BarChart inside ListView Demonstrates the usage of a BarChart inside a ListView item. Multiple charts inside ListView Demonstrates the usage of different chart types inside a ListView. Inverted Line Chart Demonstrates the feature of inverting the y-axis. Candle Stick Chart Demonstrates usage of the CandleStickChart. Cubic Line Chart Demonstrates cubic lines in a LineChart. Radar Chart Demonstrates the use of a spider-web like (net) chart. Colored Line Chart Shows a LineChart with different background and line color. Realtime Chart This chart is fed with new data in realtime. It also restrains the view on the x-axis. Dynamical data adding This Activity demonstrates dynamical adding of Entries and DataSets (real time graph). Performance Line Chart Renders up to 30.000 objects smoothly. Sinus Bar Chart A Bar Chart plotting the sinus function with 8.000 values. Chart in ScrollView This demonstrates how to use a chart inside a ScrollView. BarChart positive / negative This demonstrates how to create a BarChart with positive and negative values in different colors. This demonstrates how to use this library with Realm.io mobile database. Realm.io Database Time Chart Simple demonstration of a time-chart. This chart draws one line entry per hour originating from the current time in milliseconds. Filled LineChart This demonstrates how to fill an area between two LineDataSets. Half PieChart This demonstrates how to create a 180 degree PieChart.
// About About Something about this sample app.
This sample app is base on "https://github.com/PhilJay/MPAndroidChart/tree/master/MPChartExample".

 I only changed the ui and fixed some bug.

 The repository of this sample app is "https://github.com/zhuanghongji/MPAndroidChart/tree/master/MPChartExample".

 If you found some issue or advice , please let me know by "problem report" in the menu of MainActivity.

 Optimized by zhuanghongji.


// Realm Line Chart Creating a LineChart with Realm.io database Bar Chart Creating a BarChart with Realm.io database Horizontal Bar Chart Creating a HorizontalBarChart with Realm.io database Scatter Chart Creating a ScatterChart with Realm.io database Candle Stick Chart Creating a CandleStickChart with Realm.io database Bubble Chart Creating a BubbleChart with Realm.io database Pie Chart Creating a PieChart with Realm.io database Radar Chart Creating a RadarChart with Realm.io database Realm Wiki This is the code related to the wiki entry about realm.io on the MPAndroidChart github page.
